=Minimum Server Requirements= The following hardware and software is required to run a TeamMentor.
*Windows Server 2003 or higher *IIS 6 or higher *.NET 4.0 *2GB of RAM *1GB of Storage
Please note that it may be possible to run TeamMentor with less RAM and Storage. We have successfully tested TeamMentor under Windows 2003 with IIS 6 and 613MB of RAM. However performance does degrade under load and minimal configuration listed above is recommended for production environments.
=Client Side Requirements= Following browsers and platforms are supported: *IE7 or above *Firefox *Chrome *Safari *iPad
